title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 670 - Determination Of Public Need For Medical Facility Establishment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 670 - Determination Of Public Need For Medical Facility Establishment

State Regulations
§ 670.1 - Determination of public need pursuant to section 2801-a(3) of the public health law
§ 670.2 - Acute care facilities
§ 670.3 - Residential health care facilities
§ 670.4 - Ambulatory surgery services
§ 670.5 - Long-term inpatient rehabilitation programs for head-injured patients
§ 670.6 - End stage renal dialysis service

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 670

2801-a[10][a]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
